Paper.Title: XTAG System - A Wide Coverage Grammar for English

Section.Paragraph: This paper presents the XTAG system, a grammar development tool based on the Tree Adjoining Grammar (TAG) formalism that includes a wide-coverage syntactic grammar for English. The various components of the system are discussed and preliminary evaluation results from the parsing of various corpora are given. Results from the comparison of X3AG against the IBM statistical parser and the Alvey Natural Language Tool parser are also given.
